author: Reuters Editorial
title: Armenia postpones referendum until after coronavirus emergency
description: Armenia will hold a referendum on constitutional reforms after a state of emergency linked to the coronavirus pandemic ends, Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan said on Monday.
content:
YEREVAN (Reuters) - Armenia will hold a referendum on constitutional reforms after a state of emergency linked to the coronavirus pandemic ends, Prime Minister Nikol Pashinyan said on Monday. 
The referendum had been planned for April 5.

title: Is Iran covering up its outbreak?
description: Iran has seen one of the worst coronavirus outbreaks but the true scale may be being downplayed.
content:
Iran is facing one of the largest coronavirus outbreaks in the world. Today, as families celebrate Persian New Year, Nowruz, there is concern the true scale of the virus is being downplayed by the government and could rapidly get much worse.
